title: Cabrera's Campers - 3D Environment Presentation
description: A cozy "golden hour" camping scene surrounded by a bohemian inspired fictional forest environment.

title: Fantasy DND Book Model & Textured
description: Based on a reference picture from Jack Art Studios, a practice in texturing a stylized game prop with Arnold lighting and rendering for a video game or 3D film animation.
